title: Seattle City Council Public Assets & Homelessness Committee 4/6/22
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

Pursuant to Washington State Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.15 and Senate Concurrent Resolution 8402, this public meeting will be held remotely. Meeting participation is limited to access by the telephone number provided on the meeting agenda, and the meeting is accessible via telephone and Seattle Channel online. 
Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; City Hall Park Intergovernmental Land Transfer; Seattle Center 2021 RSJI Presentation; Appointments and Reappointments to Seattle Center Advisory Commission, Washington State Convention Center Public Facilities District Board.
0:00 Call to Order
2:46 Public Comment
23:38 City Hall Park Intergovernmental Land Transfer
1:42:12 Seattle Center 2021 RSJI Presentation
2:11:07 Appointments and Reappointments
